events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position submitted by the candidate. The resume shows relevant experience in software development and cloud technologies.
The candidate's application has been categorized under Engineering due to the focus on software developer skills and experience with various programming languages.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to handle this candidate to ensure a smooth hiring process tailored for the engineering team.
Completed the initial phone screening. The candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software architecture and development methodologies, fitting well with the team requirements.
Received a positive response from the candidate confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview scheduled next week.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 3 PM UTC to assess the candidateâ€™s coding skills and problem-solving ability.
